database.sql: create or replace view V_PRODINVENTORYVALUE as select T_PRODINVENTORY.ID, T_PRODINVENTORY.COMPANYID, T_PRODINVENTORY.PRODUCTID, T_PRODINVENTORY.STORAGEID, T_PRODINVENTORY.QUANTITY, T_PRODINVENTORY.RESERVED, T_PRODINVENTORY.UOMID, T_PRODPRODCOST.PRICE, T_PRODPRODCOST.PRICE * T_PRODINVENTORY.QUANTITY as TOTAL, T_PRODPRODCOST.CURRENCYID, T_PRODPRODCOST.VALIDFROM, T_PRODPRODCOST.VALIDUNTIL from T_PRODINVENTORY left join T_PRODPRODCOST on T_PRODINVENTORY.PRODUCTID = T_PRODPRODCOST.PRODID where ((T_PRODPRODCOST.VALIDFROM < current_timestamp and T_PRODPRODCOST.VALIDUNTIL > current_timestamp) or T_PRODPRODCOST.PRICE is null) and T_PRODINVENTORY.TYPEID in (select T_CMABSTRACT.ID from T_CMABSTRACT where T_CMABSTRACT.UUID='de159d46-cafd-48b9-9113-bb40ce7ef1ee');
